author: Digger RJ (invalid@example.com)
title: Found a Unicorn and an 1800‚Äôs Indian!!
text: [Digger RJ](/members/digger-rj.119192/) Gold Member - Aug 24, 2017 - 18,669 - 32,476 - ü•á Banner finds - [1](/members/digger-rj.119192/golden-content) - üèÜ Honorable Mentions: - [2](/forums/233/?prefix_id=7&starter_id=119192) - Detector(s) used - Minelab CTX 3030; Minelab Equinox 800; XP Deus 2 - Primary Interest: - All Treasure Hunting Ok, so I had a little time after I got done with a job and wanted to go back to the Silver town, but I was limited on time. So I found an oldie here local that I know has been hunted before. I still wanted to see if I could pull something they missed! Sure enough I got two tokens in the back yard, and when I got to the front I was like pretty sure that‚Äôs all I was gonna get that they‚Äôd missed. The fronts are usually always hammered! Up by the hedges close to the house on the right side of the sidewalk I got a nice 94-95 solid signal . Dug it out at about 7‚Äù, and it was a Cool old Unicorn. Just about to wrap up the front and leave and I got a nice deep target hitting in the Indian/Zinc range(84-87), but faint and solid. This one was about 8‚Äù deep. I had to go and couldn‚Äôt make it out when I pulled it out so I stuck it in My finds container and had to leave. When I got home I may have been a little excited to see if it was a Wheat or an Indian, cause I‚Äôve gotten Wheats with these numbers before. Sure enough as soon as I got it out I could see the Wreath on the back side. Yes!!üòÅ After using a toothpick I got the date of 1893!!! I like it when that happens üòé Thanks for looking and Happy Hunting !!! Sure enough I got two tokens in the back yard, and when I got to the front I was like pretty sure that‚Äôs all I was gonna get that they‚Äôd missed. The fronts are usually always hammered! Up by the hedges close to the house on the right side of the sidewalk I got a nice 94-95 solid signal . Dug it out at about 7‚Äù, and it was a Cool old Unicorn. Just about to wrap up the front and leave and I got a nice deep target hitting in the Indian/Zinc range(84-87), but faint and solid. This one was about 8‚Äù deep. I had to go and couldn‚Äôt make it out when I pulled it out so I stuck it in My finds container and had to leave. When I got home I may have been a little excited to see if it was a Wheat or an Indian, cause I‚Äôve gotten Wheats with these numbers before. Sure enough as soon as I got it out I could see the Wreath on the back side. Yes!!üòÅ After using a toothpick I got the date of 1893!!! I like it when that happens üòé Thanks for looking and Happy Hunting !!! [Upvote](javascript:)12

author: Scott Baker
title: QuickLink: The genocide claim against Israel doesn't add up | OpEd News
text: Free Palestine - Stop Genocide. The genocide does not exist. Stop saying it does. ( [Image](https://farm66.static.flickr.com/65535/53334876563_5e01ac010e.jpg)by [alisdare1](https://www.flickr.com/people/59952459@N08/)) [Details](/populum/attrdetails.php?vid=180105) [DMCA](/populum/dmca.php?vid=180105) The ratio of combatant-to-civilian casualties in Gaza should be recognized as a historical achievement of protecting civilian lives. ‚ÄúThe genocide in Gaza‚Äù cause has been roiling university campuses in the US and around the globe. The genocide accusation is the subject of a lawsuit filed by South Africa against Israel at the International Court of Justice and has been repeated by a few other countries, some scholars, endless activists, and one US congresswoman. Its political importance is not restricted to Israel. President Biden, it is argued, might be punished in the upcoming elections by progressive voters for complicity with this alleged genocide. The accusation could thus exert tremendous influence on world politics. This is a fascinating socio-political phenomenon since it is easy to prove that there is no genocide.

author: VNExplorer
title: Fattorino vince 4 milioni di euro alla lotteria ma lavora a Natale per non abbandonare i colleghi: ¬´Non cambier√≤¬ª
text:
Fattorino vince 4 milioni di euro alla lotteria ma lavora a Natale per non abbandonare i colleghi: ¬´Non cambier√≤¬ª
Diventare milionari non capita tutti i giorni. E, soprattutto, non capita a tutti. Nonostante ci√≤, dopo aver vinto quasi quattro milioni di sterline, un 45enne inglese ha deciso di andare a lavorare come se niente fosse, per non lasciare soli i colleghi nel periodo natalizio e per continuare a tenere i piedi per terra.
Lotteria Italia, la tradizione batte la crisi: vendite biglietti verso quota 6.6 milioni, +10% rispetto al 2022
La storia √à una storia incredibile quella di Jonny Johnston, 45enne inglese diventato milionario grazie a una vincita alla lotteria. L‚Äôuomo, un fattorino della catena di supermercati britannica Tesco, dopo venti anni di tentativi giocando gli stessi numeri √® riuscito ad indovinare la ‚Äúsestina‚Äù vincente, conquistando cos√¨ 3,8 milioni di sterline, pari a pi√π di 4 milioni di euro. Venuto a conoscenza della vincita durante una serata fuori con i colleghi, Jonny Johnston ha detto di aver ricevuto una notifica sull‚Äôapp con la comunicazione della vittoria del premio. Non pensando che la vincita fosse cos√¨ alta, l‚Äôuomo non ha dato peso alla cosa. Solo il giorno dopo, controllando il telefono insieme alla sua compagna, Christina Williams, il 45enne inglese si √® reso conto dell‚Äôincredibile vincita. Intervistato dalla BBC, l‚Äôuomo ha confessato tutto il suo stupore: ¬´Pensavo che forse avevo vinto 38.000 sterline, ma poi c‚Äôerano troppi zeri. Ho passato il telefono a Christina perch√© controllasse e anche lei era incredula. Entrambi abbiamo iniziato a pensare che fosse un trucco, addirittura una truffa¬ª. Dopo i dovuti controlli con Camelot Group, l‚Äôoperatore della Lotteria Nazionale del Regno Unito, la coppia ha per√≤ capito la vera entit√† della vincita. Nonostante i quasi quattro milioni di sterline, la felicit√† e la voglia di festeggiare, Jonny Johnston ha per√≤ deciso di andare a lavoro, per non abbandonare i colleghi in un periodo delicato come quello natalizio e per rimanere con i piedi per terra: ¬´Dobbiamo tenere i piedi per terra, questo non ci rende persone diverse. Ci piace lavorare, ci tiene occupati e ti d√† uno scopo¬ª, ha detto l‚Äôuomo sempre alla BBC. La coppia ha rivelato poi che utilizzer√† i soldi per dare sicurezze finanziarie alla famiglia e andare in crociera ai Caraibi una volta che Jonny avr√† ottenuto il passaporto.

author: Agencias
title: El jurado popular declara culpable al acusado de matar a un hombre con una catana durante una pelea en Miguel Esteban
text: TOLEDO.- El jurado popular que ha juzgado en Toledo a un hombre acusado de matar a otro con una catana en octubre de 2020, en una pelea en un bar del municipio de Miguel Esteban, lo ha declarado culpable de homicidio. Los integrantes del jurado han considerado, por mayor√≠a, que el procesado es culpable de un delito de homicidio consumado, as√≠ como de un delito de lesiones, con la eximente incompleta de leg√≠tima defensa. En la vista, que se ha desarrollado en la Audiencia Provincial de Toledo, se han juzgado los hechos ocurridos el 30 de octubre de 2020 en un bar de Miguel Esteban que regentaba la novia del acusado, al que acudieron otro hombre que era la expareja de la mujer y un amigo de √©ste. Dentro del local se inici√≥ una pelea en la que los dos visitantes atacaron al acusado, que se defendi√≥ del ataque utilizando dando mandobles con una catana, con la que alcanz√≥ en el cuello al amigo de la expareja de su novia, que muri√≥ en el bar a consecuencia de la herida. A su vez, el hombre que era expareja de la gerente del bar y padre de sus hijas, tambi√©n ha sido declarado culpable por el jurado de un delito de lesiones con medio peligroso, sin que sus integrantes hayan apreciado la eximente de embriaguez. Tras la lectura del veredicto, la fiscal ha ratificado la petici√≥n de que el procesado sea condenado a nueve a√±os de prisi√≥n por el delito de homicidio consumado, mientras que la acusaci√≥n particular que representa a los padres del fallecido ha pedido una condena de diez a√±os de c√°rcel para el procesado, as√≠ como que indemnice a cada uno de sus progenitores con 200.000 euros. Mientras tanto, las defensas de ambos acusados han solicitado penas rebajadas, en el caso del culpable del delito de homicidio y lesiones a menos de cuatro a√±os de c√°rcel y de dos a√±os de prisi√≥n para el condenado por delito de lesiones.

author: Anonym
title: Despite economic downturn: Immigration drives employment to record high - The Limited Times
text:
Status: 02.01.2024, 10:26 a.m.
CommentsPrint Share
Despite the economic downturn, Germany is recording record employment. An increase that is mainly due to immigration and increased labor force participation.
Munich ‚Äì Despite the economic downturn, the number of employees in Germany rose to a record level last year. On average, around 45.9 million people were in employment, as the Federal Statistical Office announced on Tuesday according to provisional calculations. "This was more than at any time since German reunification in 1990," it said. The old record of 2022 was thus exceeded by 0.7 percent or 333,000 people - although Europe's largest economy shrank last year, according to the leading institutes. In 2020, the Corona crisis had put an end to the increase in the number of people in employment, which had previously lasted for more than 14 years, and led to a decline of 361,000, since then things have been looking up again.
In industry (excluding construction), the number of persons in employment rose slightly by 25,000 or 0.3 percent to around 8.1 million. ¬© Julian Stratenschulte/dpa
"Expect that employment will soon reach its zenith" "One cause of the increase in employment in 2023 was the immigration of foreign workers," the statistics office explained. In addition, there was a higher labour force participation of the domestic population. "These two growth impulses outweighed the dampening effects of demographic change on the labour market, which will lead to a significant decline in the working-age population in the medium term," the statistics office stressed.
According to the German Institute for Economic Research (DIW), the number of people in employment could break the 46 million mark this year and then rise to 2025.46 million in 082. "We expect that employment will soon reach its zenith," according to the current economic forecast of the Kiel Institute for the World Economy (IfW). The potential labour force will begin to shrink in the not too distant future due to ageing and despite the expected above-average level of immigration. "The economic recovery in the next two years is likely to temporarily counteract this," the IfW explained.
Service provider as a job machine Nine out of ten of the additional employees in 2023 found a job in the service sectors. These recorded an increase of a total of 295,000 people or 0.9 percent to around 34.6 million. The largest absolute increase was recorded in public services, education and health, with an increase of 116,000 persons in employment or 1.0 percent. The second strongest growth was reported in the trade, transport and hospitality sector with 87,000 persons in employment (+0.9 percent).
In industry (excluding construction), the number of persons in employment rose slightly by 25,000 or 0.3 percent to around 8.1 million. In the construction industry, there was an increase of 15,000 persons in employment or 0.6 percent to around 2.6 million. In the agriculture, forestry and fisheries sector, on the other hand, 2000 fewer people were employed than in 2022, which corresponds to a decrease of 0.4 percent to 555,000.
The number of employees was decisive for the overall positive development: it grew by 2023,363 or 000.0 percent to 9.42 million in 1. This was largely due to the positive development of employment subject to social security contributions. "For the self-employed, including family workers, on the other hand, the downward trend that has now lasted for twelve years continued in 2023," it said. Their number fell by 30,000 to 3.9 million (minus 0.8 percent). (mare/Reuters)

author: @andaluciainf
title: Puente destituye al presidente de Adif, √Ångel Contreras | Andaluc√≠a Informaci√≥n. Noticias de la Costa Occidental
text: El ministro de Transportes y Movilidad Sostenible, √ìscar Puente, ha destituido al presidente de Adif, √Ångel Contreras, con el objetivo de "impulsar la gesti√≥n de la empresa", seg√∫n han confirmado a Europa Press en fuentes gubernamentales. Este cese se produce tras varias destituciones llevadas a cabo por el ministro en los √∫ltimos meses por la auditor√≠a relacionada con el 'caso Koldo', aunque desde el Ministerio remarcan que la destituci√≥n del presidente no tiene relaci√≥n con este asunto. No obstante, Contreras llevaba menos de un a√±o en el cargo, cuando con la llegada de Puente al Ministerio se sustituy√≥ a la anterior presidenta, Mar√≠a Luisa Dom√≠nguez. El ya expresidente de Adif tuvo que comparecer en el Senado en el marco de la comisi√≥n de investigaci√≥n sobre todas las ramificaciones del 'caso Koldo', donde asegur√≥ que "nunca hab√≠a ama√±ado ning√∫n tipo de contrato". Contreras defendi√≥ que su relaci√≥n con Koldo --aparec√≠a implicado en el informe de la UCO-- se limitaba al "plano social" tras la salida del exasesor de Jos√© Luis √Åbalos del Ministerio a finales de 2022. Tambi√©n se√±al√≥ que alguna vez quedaron para tomar caf√© e incluso llegaron a comer hasta dos veces en 'La Chalana' y en otra ocasi√≥n con el exministro Jos√© Luis √Åbalos cuando ya era diputado. Por su parte, √ìscar Puente ya defendi√≥ en varias ocasiones que destituir√≠a a cualquier cargo del Ministerio que se viese implicado en el caso. De momento, adem√°s de a Contreras, ya ha cesado al secretario general de Puertos del Estado, √Ålvaro S√°nchez Manzanares; al subsecretario de Estado, Jes√∫s Manuel G√≥mez, y al jefe de personal de Adif, Michaux Miranda; por su condici√≥n de investigados en el 'caso Koldo'. Al margen de esta trama de corrupci√≥n, sobre el responsable de Adif tambi√©n pesaban las numerosas incidencias que se han producido ese verano en la red ferroviaria. Precisamente este viernes, en la estaci√≥n madrile√±a de Atocha se han producido retrasos medios de 50 minutos en la alta velocidad como consecuencia de una aver√≠a en la se√±alizaci√≥n. La circulaci√≥n se interrumpi√≥ antes de las 14.00 horas, aunque fue restablecida en torno a las 15.30 horas. Env√≠a tu noticia a: [participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)
